dcterms:description: The EasyCom dataset features 5 hours of conversations involving 3-5 participants in a noisy environment, aimed at developing solutions to improve the audibility of partners for the camera wearer.
dcterms:title: EasyCom Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kristen Grauman
Wenqi Jia
Miao Liu
Hao Jiang
Ishwarya Ananthabhotla
James M Rehg
Vamsi Krishna Ithapu
Ruohan Gao
dcterms:description: Ego4D includes 45 hours of egocentric video during social interactions, with labels for tasks such as 'Looking at me' and 'Talking to me', facilitating the analysis of social interactions.
dcterms:title: Ego4D

dcterms:creator: Fiona Ryan
Hao Jiang
Abhinav Shukla
James M. Rehg
Vamsi Krishna Ithapu
dcterms:description: The SAAL dataset focuses on egocentric auditory attention localization in conversations, featuring social interactions in multiple simultaneous conversation groups.
dcterms:title: SAAL Dataset
